title: Font suggestion for outdoor cat
content:
hello typophiles,   
   
I have to design an outdoor equipment catalogue (aprox. 240p/mid price level).   
actually they use impact for headlines and weidemann for the body.   
   
I think weidemann works well but what would you suggest for headlines and body.   
   
thanks, romesh
author: nike

comments.content:
Funny. Has mine beat. I was going to make a crack about "outdoor equipment catalogue", that Romesh should make sure the paper was weatherproof, since the catalog is for outdoor use...   
   
Romesh, sorry for the jabs! Please, could you tell us more details, like the nature of the target customer?   
   
hhp
the equipment (mostly bags) is hiking, trekking and camping equipment for amateurs and maybe professionals.

Vendetta? Or Amplitude for display and Egyptian 505 for text?   
   
hhp

thanks for your suggestions, hrant. I'll check amplitude.   
any other suggestions are welcome.
